items.title: July 2025 auto sales move along a two-speed track
items.description: Although PV sales remained subdued, other categories offered resilience

items.title: LIC stake sale picks up pace as DIPAM finalises bankers, legal advisors
items.description: These appointments are valid for a period of three years, with a provision for extension up to five years. The DIPAM Secretary also said that individual transactions under this arrangement can take place over the next three years.

items.title: Tata Steel Netherland hopeful of completing restructuring by September
items.description: The restructuring is expected to contribute an estimated Euro 180 million toward Tata Steel Nederland's targetted cost savings of Euro 500 million by FY26.

items.title: International Gemmological Institute India: Facing the US tariff headwinds
items.description: The increasing share of LGDs in the diamond jewellery industry is beneficial for IGIL, which has established itself as leader in the segment. Leveraging this lead, IGIL is tapping new segments and consumers.

items.title: Maruti Q1FY26: Export surge and rural demand help navigate domestic slowdown
items.description: The car-maker needs to overcome its budget-car image while establishing credibility in the higher-margin SUV segment

items.title: Dabur Q1FY26: Demand recovery, valuation are key positives
items.description: Promising rural trends, urban demand recovery are principal growth drivers

items.title: HUL Q1FY26: Competitive growth driven by portfolio transformation
items.description: Strong brands, and higher salience of premium portfolio remain key growth catalysts

items.title: Swiggy Q1 FY26: Steady performance, but profitability remains a concern
items.description: Near-term focus of the company shifts to driving efficiency and narrowing losses

items.title: Eicher Motors Q1FY26: Maintains growth despite margin dip
items.description: Demand outlook remains strong as the company focuses on global expansion and market share gain

items.title: Reliance Industries to hold 48th AGM on 29 August, sets record date for dividend eligibility
items.description: The board of RIL had earlier recommended a final dividend of Rs 5.50 per equity share, which was declared alongside its March quarter earnings on April 25.

items.title: Google loses appeal over app store reforms in Epic Games case
items.description: The tech giant also argued that a jury should never have heard Epic's lawsuit because it sought to enjoin Google's conduct — a request normally decided by a judge — and not collect damages.

items.title: Jaguar Land Rover says CEO Adrian Mardell to step down
items.description: Jaguar Land Rover is a wholly owned subsidiary of India's Tata Motors.
